dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on gathering information about each other's actions and behaviors to identify any suspicious activity that might help us find the assassin. Let's work together to ensure everyone's safety in this game.

dialogue.message: I agree with Alice's suggestion. Let's all share our daily activities and try to keep an open communication to build trust among us. As the assassin, I'll ensure my actions are not too suspicious.
